The drum side come with 2 drumsticks for fun drumming for 1 2 3 year old boys and girls enjoy playing the drum set. Wonderful piano play mat for baby, piano keyboard baby gifts, toddler valentines gifts.

EDUCATIONAL MUSICAL TOYS: This toddler musical toys can develop baby's musical interest, improve hand and feet coordination skills, fostering creativity, and promoting exercise at an early age. The music play mat supports toddler jumps, walks and play the piano keys with their hands, which is very beneficial to improve hand and foot coordination skills. TOUCH SENSITIVE & INTERACTIVE: Our baby play mat touch inspired, unlike ordinary physical buttons, can be touched by hand and stepped on by foot, interactive, just touch and click on the musical instrument icon to select the instrument you want to play. In addition, the toddler toys age 1-2 is designed for 2 players, it is a good way to enhance interaction between parent and child., and is a great early learning toy.

IDEAL BABY BOYS & GIRLS GIFT: Our Musical mat is designed for toddler 1 2 3 year old, with clear music sounds and adjustable volumes to attract toddlers’ attention and enjoy for hours. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Musical Play Mats for Babies and Toddlers（Need 3 AA Batteries） Our 2 in 1 baby musical toys is designed for toddler 1-3, with clear music sounds and adjustable volumes to attract toddlers’ attention and enjoy for hours. The baby play mats for floor or desk help baby learn to play music in many different styles. On the drum side your toddler can play music by hitting the drums with 2 sticks. The piano side has 13 piano function keys and 6 instrument sounds and each key can emit a different melody. There are also 13 build-in music, piano recording & playback.

Wonderful Parent-Child Time Interactive Toy --- Musical Mat for Toddlers Toys Age 1-3 This piano play mat can be touching and stepping on, hitting by the sticks, improves kid's hand-feet coordination at early age. Parents can play music pads with their babies to increase parent-child interaction and enjoy easy parent-child time. Ideal baby musical toys for 1 year old 2-3 year old. First birthday gifts for boys girls, baby 1st birthday presents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was other than I thought, and has a lot of functions. You can record and play back your music 🎶 the mat folds up for travel or clean up, which is nice. I was very impressed by the quality. A wonderful toy for babies or toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but loud
reviews.reviewText: Love this but I wish it was made so that the volume would stay on low instead of having to put it on low every time my grandson crawls on it once he’s been off of it for a while. Other than that, it’s a great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Melodic Joy for Little Ones - A Symphony of Fun!
reviews.reviewText: The combination of piano and drum sounds is incredibly engaging and perfect for sensory development.It's the ideal toy for toddlers aged 1-2 years old as it provides just the right balance of stimulation and fun. The mat is easy for little hands to play with and explore.The mat is made with child-friendly materials, which makes it safe and durable enough to withstand enthusiastic play. The soft surface is also gentle for my child to sit or crawl on.The mat encourages musical exploration, which is excellent for cognitive development. It's a fun way to introduce rhythm and melody at an early age.Cleaning is a breeze because the mat is easy to wipe down, which is essential for maintaining hygiene with baby toys.The lightweight and foldable design make it easy to store or take on the go, which makes it a staple for our trips to grandparents’ house.This musical mat makes for a fantastic gift for birthdays or other special occasions. It's unique, entertaining, and sure to delight any toddler.Watching my child create their own music is wonderful. It stimulates creativity and imagination, and it's great to see.The adjustable volume is a lifesaver. I can turn down the sound when needed, making it enjoyable for both my child and me.The bright colors and playful design are visually stimulating and attract my child’s attention every time.In conclusion, the Baby Musical Mat is an excellent toy for young children, blending fun, learning, and musical exploration. It's the perfect choice for parents looking to enrich their child's playtime with an engaging and educational experience. I highly recommend it for its quality and entertainment value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Musical Joy for My Child
reviews.reviewText: The play mat has two sides, and each one offers a unique musical experience. On one side, there's a colorful piano with 13 keys, each producing a different instrument sound. It includes piano, violin, vibraphone, trumpet, accordion, and guitar sounds. My child absolutely loves pressing these keys, creating their own melodies, and dancing to the tunes. It's like having a mini orchestra at home, and it's so much fun to see my child's eyes light up as they explore the world of music.The other side of the mat features two drums and comes with two drumsticks. My child adores this side just as much, as they can drum to their heart's content. It's not just about making noise; it's about learning rhythm and enjoying the process. Sometimes, my child and I have little drumming duets, which bring us closer and create beautiful memories together.It's endless entertainment and a valuable educational tool. I can see my child's face light up with excitement every time they play with it. It's a gift that keeps on giving, sparking their creativity and musical curiosity. I'm so glad I bought it, and I would highly recommend it to other parents looking to add some musical magic to their child's playtime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for a birthday present and thankfully opened it first because it's way smaller than I thought and when my toddler steps on it, it doesn't make the sounds it's supposed too.
